desc.p: Enquiry selection operands
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 35 characters.
This is a multivalue field.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Identifies the Enquiry Level as saved from Phantom Enquiry.
Standard T24 numeric field.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Identifies the notification message upon completion,
where:- Y = notify immediately, N = never notify (user must check ctrl file).
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 5 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Specifies the total number of Phantoms permitted for this user (i.e. the number for which job history is saved).
Standard T24 numeric field with a maximum of 2 characters can be entered.
Maximum number is 25.
Identifies the phantom user number of active phantoms.
Standard T24 numeric field with a maximum of 5 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
This is the ID of CONTROL.ENQ.PH.
Minimum one and a maximum of 3 characters is allowed.
Identifies the run number of the Last Phantom activated for this user.
Standard T24 numeric field with a maximum of 5 characters.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field.
Identifies the Enquiry names of each Phantom enquiry.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 15 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field.
Identifies the number of Variables saved from ENQ.SELECT for each Phantom enquiry.
Standard T24 numeric field with a maximum of 5 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Specifies the number of Active Phantoms permitted at any one time.
Standard T24 numeric field with a maximum of 2 characters can be entered.
Maximum number is 5.
Identifies the name of the Phantom como's.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 35 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Identifies the status of each Phantom enquiry,
where:- R = Running, C = Completed, A = Aborted by User
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 5 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field.
Identifies the number of Pages built by each Phantom enquiry.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 5 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Enquiry selection fields
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 35 characters.
This is a multivalue field.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Identifies the time & date of Phantom enquiry start.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 20 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Identifies the control message from User to each Phantom,
where:- C = Continue processing, S = Stop processing
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 5 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Identifies the enquiry selection data lists.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 35 characters.
This is a multivalue field.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
Identifies the time & date of Phantom enquiry finished.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with a maximum of 20 characters.
Field ENQUIRY.NAME to ENQUIRY.LEVEL form a related multivalue set.
NOINPUT - automatically updated field
